name: Sarthak Batra
position: PhD in Computer Vision @CVSSP | University of Surrey I IIT Kharagpur
about: I am a PhD student at the Center for Vision, Speech, and Signal Processing (CVSSP), University of Surrey. I am working with Prof. Adrian Hilton and Dr. Armin Mustafa on 3D human and object reconstruction from images to enhance the realism of digital humans for immersive experiences.
